block.p: American League YANKEES--Activated INF D'Angelo Jimenez from the 60-day disabled list and optioned him to Columbus of the International League.
American League YANKEES--Activated INF D'Angelo Jimenez from the 60-day disabled list and optioned him to Columbus of the International League.
National League LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Recalled OF Bruce Aven from Albuquerque of the PCL. Optioned RHP Mike Judd to Albuquerque.

National Football League CAROLINA PANTHERS--Waived G Cheston Blackshear, WR Shawn Foreman, DB Bill Gustin, T Matt Hogg, LB Kevin Homer, DT Jon Kirksey and WR Luke Leverson. Reached injury settlements with DL Rasheed Simmons and DL Harry Deligianis. Placed LB Lamont Green on the non-football injury list. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Waived S Chris Bayne, DE Rameel Connor, RB Brian Edwards, LB Tommy Hendricks, T Willie Jones, DE Tim Martin, G O'Lester Pope, LB Kyle Shipley and WR Corey Thomas. JETS--Waived S Omar Stoutmire, WR Yatil Green, DE Anthony Cook, QB Jim Kubiak, C Keith Short, OL Mike Gisler, OL Dennis O'Sullivan, RB Vaughn Sanders, DE Jon Michals and T Jeff Pilon. TENNESSEE TITANS--Waived QB Kevin Daft, OL Wes Shivers, FB Garett Gould, TE Mike Leach, TE Jason Gavadza, C Craig Page, DT Rod Walker, DT Henry Slay, LB Phil Glover, CB Wade Davis and DB Jerard White. Reached injury settlements with WR Gerald Harris and Mike Scarborough.
MISSOURI--Suspended WR Travis Garvin and T Cliff Young one game for a violation of team rules. RHODE ISLAND--Announced the resignation of Tom Abatemarco, men's assistant basketball coach.
